header.topTitle: Looking for custom plans and pricing? Get a preview of our SEO Packages
header.subtitle: “Our custom SEO packages are tailored to your business goals, combining advanced keyword research, on-page optimization, and data-driven strategies to maximize visibility and conversions.”

pricingDetails.title: Your Website Goals
pricingDetails.description: Your SEO pricing depends on your goals — whether you're aiming for higher rankings, local visibility, or national reach. We tailor plans around measurable outcomes that align with your objectives.

pricingDetails.title: Keywords & Competition
pricingDetails.description: We analyze keyword difficulty, search intent, and competitor strategy to determine the level of effort and budget needed to achieve consistent results.

pricingDetails.title: On-site & Off-site Requirements
pricingDetails.description: From technical optimization to link-building campaigns, your plan cost reflects the mix of on-page and off-page strategies required to achieve strong rankings.

includedItems: In-depth website audit and keyword research
Google Business Profile and citations setup
Site speed, indexing, and mobile optimization
